argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | slesolex.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | slesolex.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 3 |  | slesolex.v | |- V = ( ( Base ` R ) ^m N ) |
| 4 |  | slesolex.x | |- .x. = ( R maVecMul <. N , N >. ) |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_matrcl | |- ( X e. B -> ( N e. Fin /\ R e. _V ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_simpld | |- ( X e. B -> N e. Fin ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( N =/= (/) /\ N e. Fin ) -> N e. Fin ) |
| 8 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( N =/= (/) /\ N e. Fin ) -> N =/= (/) ) |
| 9 | 7, 7, 8 | #P_3jca | |- ( ( N =/= (/) /\ N e. Fin ) -> ( N e. Fin /\ N e. Fin /\ N =/= (/) ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_ex | |- ( N =/= (/) -> ( N e. Fin -> ( N e. Fin /\ N e. Fin /\ N =/= (/) ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( N =/= (/) /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( N e. Fin -> ( N e. Fin /\ N e. Fin /\ N =/= (/) ) ) ) |
| 12 | 6, 11 | #P_syl5com | |- ( X e. B -> ( ( N =/= (/) /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( N e. Fin /\ N e. Fin /\ N =/= (/) ) ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( X e. B /\ Y e. V ) -> ( ( N =/= (/) /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( N e. Fin /\ N e. Fin /\ N =/= (/) ) ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_impcom | |- ( ( ( N =/= (/) /\ R e. Ring ) /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. V ) ) -> ( N e. Fin /\ N e. Fin /\ N =/= (/) ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( N =/= (/) /\ R e. Ring ) -> R e. Ring ) |
| 16 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( X e. B /\ Y e. V ) -> Y e. V ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_anim12i | |- ( ( ( N =/= (/) /\ R e. Ring ) /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. V ) ) -> ( R e. Ring /\ Y e. V ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 19 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( Base ` R ) ^m ( N X. N ) ) = ( ( Base ` R ) ^m ( N X. N ) ) |
| 20 | 18, 19, 3, 4, 3 | #P_mavmulsolcl | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ N e. Fin /\ N =/= (/) ) /\ ( R e. Ring /\ Y e. V ) ) -> ( ( X .x. Z ) = Y -> Z e. V ) ) |
| 21 | 14, 17, 20 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( ( N =/= (/) /\ R e. Ring ) /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. V ) ) -> ( ( X .x. Z ) = Y -> Z e. V ) ) |
